content: Sad, really. The hatred and mockery that the left love so much is what got them here. Now, they hate Trump because he beat them at their own game. And you can bet the farm that the outgoing administration did its best to hurt the next one. I’d guess that happens a lot. But the violence of the progressives is alarming. Refusing to accept the results of an election is refusing to support democracy. There’s a signpost for that: it reads RUIN.
